GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
xen: unexport __init-annotated xen_xlate_map_ballooned_pages()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit b43387364d8291190fd4ea1322b65c337802baa2, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 243848fc018cb98c2a70c39fe1f93eb266c79835. For more details please see the references link.
